So I was playing through the game, reached Surface Tension, the part where you have to avoid touching any of the tripmines.
One tripmine was set on a crate, when I destroyed the crate, the tripmine was still working, just hovering in the air.
I’m not sure if it’s with this one only or with all tripmines.
